# selectNextTab(_:)

**Instance Method**

Selects the next tab in the tab group in the trailing direction.

## Declaration

```swift
@IBAction @MainActor func selectNextTab(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Parameters

- **sender**: The object that initiated the action to select the next tab.

## Managing Window Tabs

- **allowsAutomaticWindowTabbing**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app can automatically organize windows into tabs.
- **userTabbingPreference**: A value that indicates the user’s preference for window tabbing.
- **tab**: An object that represents information about a window when it displays as a tab.
- **tabbingIdentifier**: A value that allows a group of related windows.
- **NSWindow.TabbingIdentifier**: A value that allows a group of related windows.
- **addTabbedWindow(_:ordered:)**: Adds the provided window as a new tab in a tabbed window using the specified ordering instruction.
- **tabbingMode**: A value that indicates when a window displays tabs.
- **tabbedWindows**: An array of windows that display as tabs.
- **mergeAllWindows(_:)**: Merges all open windows into a single tabbed window.
- **selectPreviousTab(_:)**: Selects the previous tab in the tab group in the leading direction.
- **moveTabToNewWindow(_:)**: Moves the tab to a new containing window.
- **toggleTabBar(_:)**: Shows or hides the tab bar.
- **toggleTabOverview(_:)**: Shows or hides the tab overview.
- **tabGroup**: A group of windows that display together as a tab group.
